Posts.Content: May 12, 2009 02:52AM BondoBaby wrote: I'm SO thankful for this message board.....my onc said he's never heard of anyone having leg pain this far out from chemo (A/C dose dense plus Avastin 9-10-08...11 treatments of Taxol....had bad skin reaction on forearms didn't get 12th Taxol.....last chemo January 19th...last radiation April 1,2009...) I can get very discouraged at times thinking all of "this" is just in my head! But....my legs ACHE...especially at bedtime....I've been told it could be the Percocet....so I stopped taking it....I was only taking 1 10mg pill a day.....now I use Advil or Aleve....sometimes Excedrin Back & Body.....  I get frustrated because I don't have my energy back yet.....AUGH!!! I just can't seem to shake this feeling.....thank you, Tamoxifen...!!! hahahahaha.....Boy, does that stuff mess with my emotions!!!  All in all....I'm TRYING to keep an attitude of gratitude.....trust God for each day....and don't worry about tomorrow....  Thanks to you for giving me some peace of mind......God bless all of you.....  I love you......LOTS!!! Bonnie
Posts.Title: ackes in legs please help with info starr BondoBaby
